faq.subheading: Direct answers about our institutional crypto liquidity services

questions.question: What is the minimum amount to operate on the OTC desk?
questions.answer: We work with operations starting from $4,000. This amount ensures you have access to our institutional liquidity and specialized support that makes the difference in large transactions.

questions.question: How do you guarantee the best market prices?
questions.answer: Our OTC desk has direct access to the deepest order books in the global market. We aggregate liquidity from multiple exchanges and negotiate fixed prices without slippage, even for million-dollar volumes.

questions.question: How long does it take to execute an operation?
questions.answer: Operations are executed in real-time during desk operating hours (24/7). For fiat currency conversions, settlement occurs via instant transfer in up to 3 seconds or bank transfer within 2 business hours.

questions.question: Do you offer support for complex strategies?
questions.answer: Yes! Our team specializes in structuring complex operations such as cross-border payments, currency hedging, international arbitrage, and institutional DeFi strategies. Each client has a dedicated consultant.

questions.question: Which cryptocurrencies do you operate with?
questions.answer: We operate with Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), stablecoins (USDT, USDC, DAI), and over 50 major crypto assets. For specific assets or very large volumes, consult our desk to verify availability.

questions.question: How does conversion to different fiat currencies work?
questions.answer: We offer direct conversion to BRL, USD, and EUR with institutional rates. We use our own liquidity pools and strategic banking partnerships to guarantee the best market conditions.

questions.question: What is Axia's differential compared to other exchanges?
questions.answer: We are not a traditional exchange. We are your private trading desk with: guaranteed institutional liquidity, fixed prices without slippage, specialized 24/7 support, confidential execution, and personalized operation structuring.

questions.question: How can I integrate the liquidity API into my platform?
questions.answer: Our RESTful API offers programmatic access to institutional liquidity. We provide complete documentation, SDKs for major languages, and dedicated technical support throughout the integration.

questions.question: Do you serve companies and individuals?
questions.answer: Yes, we serve both individuals and legal entities that operate with large volumes. For companies, we offer corporate solutions including multi-users, compliance controls, and customized reports.

questions.question: How do you ensure operation security?
questions.answer: We use military-grade security infrastructure with: institutional multisig custody, cold storage for 95% of funds, quarterly security audits, rigorous KYC/AML compliance, and cybercrime insurance.

questions.question: Can I operate outside business hours?
questions.answer: Absolutely! The crypto market never stops and our desk operates 24/7. You can execute operations at any time, capturing opportunities in Asian, European, or American markets without limitations.

questions.question: How to start operating today?
questions.answer: Simple: (1) Fill out our pre-registration form, (2) Our team will contact you within 1 hour, (3) After validation, your account is activated within 24h. You'll be operating with institutional liquidity the same day.
